title: Fruit crumble tart
ingredients: ['1 (23cm) unbaked sweet pastry case', '3 apples', '3 fresh peaches', '1 pear', '125g raspberries', '150g caster sugar', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '3 tablespoons plain flour', '75g dark brown soft sugar', '100g plain flour', '90g unsalted butter', '60g chopped pecans']
